user.title: ISP Health Monitor Setup
user.description:
Configure your ISP health monitoring settings. This integration tracks your internet connection quality, speed, and reliability. All core features work without API keys using free services.

**Rate Limits:**
• ip-api.com: 45 requests/minute (free)
• ipinfo.io: 50,000 requests/month (free), unlimited with token
• ipgeolocation.io: Requires API key (paid service)

**Note:** {rate_limits}
